text: @JeremySWallace @elrond50 @GregAbbott_TX follows the party line. ⬆️ in COVID-19 is all on re-opening the state too soon. Masks are not being worn. Bars/restaurants not enough social distancing. Shutdown coming. https://t.co/oG1uOYmZig
